20101225073533.000|20101225073535.000|CC1|VATICAN CITY, THIS IS MONSIGNOR 
20101225073535.000|20101225073537.000|CC1|TOM POWERS, EXTENDING TO EACH

20101225073710.000|20101225073712.000|CC1|SO OUTSIDE IN THE SQUARE FOR THE
20101225073712.000|20101225073717.000|CC1|OVERFLOW CROWD.                 
20101225073717.000|20101225073720.000|CC1|IT HAS BEEN A RAINY, WARM DAY   
20101225073720.000|20101225073721.000|CC1|HERE IN ROME.

20101225073728.000|20101225073748.000|CC1|P.M.

20101225073818.000|20101225073820.000|CC1|SEE.

20101225073823.000|20101225073833.000|CC1|SCENE.

20101225073851.000|20101225073854.000|CC1|THE SEMIN NAIRIANS FROM THE

20101225073900.000|20101225073918.000|CC1|CROSS AND CANDLES.              
20101225073918.000|20101225073923.000|CC1|??                              
20101225073923.000|20101225073926.000|CC1|AND THE TRUMPETS BEGIN TO PLAY  
20101225073926.000|20101225073928.000|CC1|AND THE CHOIR WILL WELCOME THE  
20101225073928.000|20101225073943.000|CC1|PROCESSION AND THE HOLY FATHER. 
20101225073943.000|20101225074004.000|CC1|??                              
20101225074004.000|20101225074013.000|CC1|AND THERE IS POPE BENEDICT XVI. 
20101225074013.000|20101225074016.000|CC1|POPE BENEDICT WAS BORN JOSEPH   
20101225074016.000|20101225074020.000|CC1|RATZINGER ON HOLY SATURDAY 1927.
20101225074020.000|20101225074023.000|CC1|HE WAS ORDAINED A PRIEST IN     
20101225074023.000|20101225074023.000|CC1|1951.                           
20101225074023.000|20101225074025.000|CC1|HE SPENT YEARS AS A BRILLIANT   
20101225074025.000|20101225074028.000|CC1|STUDENT AND THEN RENOWNED AND   
20101225074028.000|20101225074030.000|CC1|POPULAR PROFESSOR OF THEOLOGY.  
20101225074030.000|20101225074035.000|CC1|IN 1977, POPE PAUL VI NAMED HIM 
20101225074035.000|20101225074037.000|CC1|ARCHBISHOP OF MUNICH AND LATER  
20101225074037.000|20101225074040.000|CC1|THAT SAME YEAR A CARDINAL.      
20101225074040.000|20101225074042.000|CC1|JOHN PAUL II MADE HIM PREFECT OF
20101225074042.000|20101225074043.000|CC1|THE CONGREGATION FOR THE        
20101225074043.000|20101225074046.000|CC1|DOCTRINE OF THE FAITH IN 1981.  
20101225074046.000|20101225074049.000|CC1|AND THEN AT THE AGE OF 78, ON   
20101225074049.000|20101225074053.000|CC1|APRIL 19, 2005, HE WAS ELECTED  
20101225074053.000|20101225074057.000|CC1|THE 265th POPE AND THE 16th TO  
20101225074057.000|20101225074123.000|CC1|CHOOSE THE NAME BENEDICT.       
20101225074123.000|20101225074125.000|CC1|THOSE WHO HAVE THE PLEASURE OF  
20101225074125.000|20101225074127.000|CC1|MEETING POPE BENEDICT KNOW OF   
20101225074127.000|20101225074130.000|CC1|HIS KINDNESS, HIS HUMILITY, HIS 
20101225074130.000|20101225074131.000|CC1|BRILLIANCE AND, OF COURSE, HIS  
20101225074131.000|20101225074136.000|CC1|PERSONAL HOLINESS.              
20101225074136.000|20101225074137.000|CC1|POPE BENEDICT BLESSES THE       
20101225074137.000|20101225074141.000|CC1|FAITHFUL AS HE PROCESSES IN.    
20101225074141.000|20101225074142.000|CC1|AND THEY MAKE THE SIGN OF THE   
20101225074142.000|20101225074146.000|CC1|CROSS.                          
20101225074146.000|20101225074149.000|CC1|AS YOU CAN SEE, HE IS VERY MUCH 
20101225074149.000|20101225074151.000|CC1|LOVED NOT ONLY HERE IN ROME BUT 
20101225074151.000|20101225074155.000|CC1|WHEREVER HE TRAVELS AND MEETS   
20101225074155.000|20101225074209.000|CC1|THE FAITHFUL                    
20101225074209.000|20101225074213.000|CC1|THE POPE WEARS A MITER, WHICH IS
20101225074213.000|20101225074215.000|CC1|ALSO WORN BY OTHER BISHOPS.     
20101225074215.000|20101225074219.000|CC1|HE HOLDS A PASTORAL STAFF AS THE
20101225074219.000|20101225074221.000|CC1|VICAR OF JESUS CHRIST WHO IS THE
20101225074221.000|20101225074226.000|CC1|GOOD SHEPHERD.                  
20101225074226.000|20101225074228.000|CC1|AROUND HIS CHASUBLE AND HIS     
20101225074228.000|20101225074231.000|CC1|SHOULDERS HE WEARS A PALLIUM, A 
20101225074231.000|20101225074233.000|CC1|WOOLEN COLLAR WORN BY THE POPE  
20101225074233.000|20101225074235.000|CC1|AND HAS BEEN WORN BY THE POPE   
20101225074235.000|20101225074237.000|CC1|SINCE THE 4th CENTURY AND NOW   
20101225074237.000|20101225074238.000|CC1|WORN BY ALL METROPOLITAN BISHOPS
20101225074238.000|20101225074241.000|CC1|AS A SIGN OF UNITY WITH THE HOLY
20101225074241.000|20101225074241.000|CC1|SEE AND FULL EPISCOPAL          
20101225074241.000|20101225074246.000|CC1|AUTHORITY.                      
20101225074246.000|20101225074248.000|CC1|POPE BENEDICT IS JOINED TONIGHT 
20101225074248.000|20101225074252.000|CC1|BY 30 CARDINALS WHO WILL BE     
20101225074252.000|20101225074253.000|CC1|CONCELEBRATING THE MASS WITH    
20101225074253.000|20101225074255.000|CC1|HIM, A TRADITION THAT STARTED   
20101225074255.000|20101225074304.000|CC1|WITH POPE JOHN PAUL II.         
20101225074304.000|20101225074308.000|CC1|??                              
20101225074308.000|20101225074310.000|CC1|SINCE THE 12th CENTURY THERE'S  
20101225074310.000|20101225074311.000|CC1|BEEN A COLLEGE OF CARDINALS WHO 
20101225074311.000|20101225074314.000|CC1|ARE THE CLOSEST ADVISERS TO THE 
20101225074314.000|20101225074315.000|CC1|POPE AND ARE RESPONSIBLE FOR    
20101225074315.000|20101225074317.000|CC1|ELECTING THE POPE.              
20101225074317.000|20101225074319.000|CC1|THIS PAST NOVEMBER POPE BENEDICT
20101225074319.000|20101225074322.000|CC1|NAMED 24 NEW CARDINALS INCLUDING
20101225074322.000|20101225074328.000|CC1|HIS EMINENCE DONALD WUERHL OF   
20101225074328.000|20101225074329.000|CC1|WASHINGTON, D.C. AND RAYMOND

20101225074334.000|20101225074343.000|CC1|OF THE APOSTOLIC SIGNATURA HERE 
20101225074343.000|20101225074345.000|CC1|IN ROME.

20101225074349.000|20101225074351.000|CC1|WHO HE BE DISTRIBUTING HOLY     
20101225074351.000|20101225074353.000|CC1|COMMUNION LATER IN THE MASS.    
20101225074353.000|20101225074357.000|CC1|AND NOW THE CARDINALS VENERATE  
20101225074357.000|20101225074400.000|CC1|THE ALTAR WITH A KISS.          
20101225074400.000|20101225074403.000|CC1|THE ALTAR SYMBOLIZES CHRIST     
20101225074403.000|20101225074404.000|CC1|HIMSELF, AND THIS PARTICULAR    
20101225074404.000|20101225074408.000|CC1|ALTAR IS THE ALTAR CONSECRATED  
20101225074408.000|20101225074413.000|CC1|BY POPE CLEMENT VIII IN 1594.   
20101225074413.000|20101225074414.000|CC1|USUALLY RESERVED FOR THE POPE   
20101225074414.000|20101225074427.000|CC1|ALONE FOR MASS.                 
20101225074427.000|20101225074434.000|CC1|THE CHOIR IS SINGING FROM PSALM 
20101225074434.000|20101225074436.000|CC1|2, YOU ARE MY SON.              
20101225074436.000|20101225074441.000|CC1|TODAY I HAVE BEGOTTEN YOU.      
20101225074441.000|20101225074447.000|CC1|AND NOW THE HOLY FATHER WILL    
20101225074447.000|20101225074454.000|CC1|REVERENCE THE ALTAR WITH A KISS.
20101225074454.000|20101225074458.000|CC1|HE PLACES INCENSE IN A THURIBLE 
20101225074458.000|20101225074501.000|CC1|AND WILL NOW INCENSE THE        
20101225074501.000|20101225074505.000|CC1|CRUCIFIX PLACED ON THE ALTAR,   
20101225074505.000|20101225074506.000|CC1|REMINDING US OF THE CENTRALITY  
20101225074506.000|20101225074507.000|CC1|OF CHRIST AT THIS AND EVERY     
20101225074507.000|20101225074517.000|CC1|MASS.                           
20101225074517.000|20101225074519.000|CC1|HE INCENSES THE ALTAR, THE PLACE
20101225074519.000|20101225074521.000|CC1|WHERE THE SACRIFICE OF THE HOLY 
20101225074521.000|20101225074523.000|CC1|MASS TAKES PLACE, WHERE BREAD   
20101225074523.000|20101225074525.000|CC1|AND WINE BECOME THE BODY AND    
20101225074525.000|20101225074532.000|CC1|BLOOD OF JESUS CHRIST.          
20101225074532.000|20101225074534.000|CC1|THE RISING SMOKE FROM THE       
20101225074534.000|20101225074536.000|CC1|INCENSE IS A REMINDER THAT OUR  
20101225074536.000|20101225074550.000|CC1|PRAYER RISES TO GOD.            
20101225074550.000|20101225074552.000|CC1|TO THE HOLY FATHER'S RIGHT THERE
20101225074552.000|20101225074555.000|CC1|IS HIS HEADMASTER OF CEREMONIES 
20101225074555.000|20101225074558.000|CC1|MONSIGNOR GUIDO MARINI, A CREW  
20101225074558.000|20101225074600.000|CC1|OF 15 OTHER PRIESTS THIS EVENING

20101225074821.000|20101225074823.000|CC1|DEDICATED FOR PAPAL LITURGIES   
20101225074823.000|20101225074828.000|CC1|DATES BACK TO THE SCHOLA        
20101225074828.000|20101225074829.000|CC1|CANTORUM, GREGORY THE GREAT, ALL
20101225074829.000|20101225074855.000|CC1|THE WAY BACK IN THE 6th CENTURY.
20101225074855.000|20101225074857.000|CC1|>> IN THE NAME OF THE FATHER AND
20101225074857.000|20101225074859.000|CC1|OF THE SON AND OF THE HOLY      
20101225074859.000|20101225074905.000|CC1|SPIRIT, AMEN.                   
20101225074905.000|20101225074915.000|CC1|PEACE BE WITH YOU.              
20101225074915.000|20101225074917.000|CC1|MY BROTHERS AND SISTERS, TO     
20101225074917.000|20101225074918.000|CC1|PREPARE OURSELF TO CELEBRATE    
20101225074918.000|20101225074920.000|CC1|WORTHILY THE SACRED MYSTERIES,  
20101225074920.000|20101225074929.000|CC1|LET US CALL TO MIND OUR SINS.   
20101225074929.000|20101225074931.000|CC1|I CONFESS TO ALMIGHTY GOD AND TO
20101225074931.000|20101225074934.000|CC1|YOU, MY BROTHERS AND SISTERS,   
20101225074934.000|20101225074936.000|CC1|THAT I HAVE SINNED THROUGH MY   
20101225074936.000|20101225074937.000|CC1|OWN FAULT.                      
20101225074937.000|20101225074939.000|CC1|IN MY THOUGHTS AND IN MY WORDS. 
20101225074939.000|20101225074943.000|CC1|IN WHAT I HAVE DONE AND IN WHAT 
20101225074943.000|20101225074945.000|CC1|I HAVE FAILED TO DO.            
20101225074945.000|20101225074948.000|CC1|AND I ASK BLESSED MARY EVER     
20101225074948.000|20101225074950.000|CC1|VIRGIN ALL THE ANGELS AND SAINTS
20101225074950.000|20101225074951.000|CC1|AND YOU, MY BROTHERS AND        
20101225074951.000|20101225074952.000|CC1|SISTERS, TO PRAY FOR ME TO THE

20101225081453.000|20101225081456.000|CC1|LORD SHONE AROUND THEM.         
20101225081456.000|20101225081456.000|CC1|AND THEY WERE STRUCK WITH GREAT 
20101225081456.000|20101225081504.000|CC1|FEAR.                           
20101225081504.000|20101225081509.000|CC1|THE ANGEL SAID TO THEM, DO NOT  
20101225081509.000|20101225081511.000|CC1|BE AFRAID.                      
20101225081511.000|20101225081514.000|CC1|FOR BEHOLD, I PROCLAIM TO YOU   
20101225081514.000|20101225081517.000|CC1|GOOD NEWS OF GREAT JOY THAT WILL
20101225081517.000|20101225081520.000|CC1|BE FOR ALL THE PEOPLE.          
20101225081520.000|20101225081524.000|CC1|FOR TODAY IN THE CITY OF DAVID, 
20101225081524.000|20101225081526.000|CC1|A SAVIOR HAS BEEN BORN FOR YOU

20101225081529.000|20101225081535.000|CC1|AND THIS WILL BE A SIGN FOR YOU.
20101225081535.000|20101225081536.000|CC1|YOU WILL FIND AN INFANT WRAPPED 
20101225081536.000|20101225081539.000|CC1|IN SWADDLING CLOTHES AND LYING  
20101225081539.000|20101225081545.000|CC1|IN A MANGER.

20101225081854.000|20101225081900.000|CC1|DEAR BROTHERS AND SISTERS, YOU  
20101225081900.000|20101225081902.000|CC1|ARE MY SON, THIS DAY I HAVE

20101225081905.000|20101225081906.000|CC1|THE CHURCH BEGINS THE LITURGY OF

20101225081914.000|20101225081915.000|CC1|CORONATION RITE OF THE KINGS OF

20101225082706.000|20101225082709.000|CC1|IN THIS SENTENCE, ST. LUKE      
20101225082709.000|20101225082711.000|CC1|RECOUNTS QUITE SOBERLY THE GREAT
20101225082711.000|20101225082715.000|CC1|EVENT TO WHICH THE PROPHECIES

20101225082716.000|20101225082727.000|CC1|POINTED.                        
20101225082727.000|20101225082730.000|CC1|LUKE CALLS THE CHILD THE FIRST  
20101225082730.000|20101225082734.000|CC1|BORN.                           
20101225082734.000|20101225082736.000|CC1|IN THE LANGUAGE WHICH DEVELOPED 
20101225082736.000|20101225082739.000|CC1|WITHIN THE SACRED SCRIPTURE OF  
20101225082739.000|20101225082741.000|CC1|THE OLD COVENANT, FIRST BORN    
20101225082741.000|20101225082745.000|CC1|DOES NOT MEAN THE FIRST OF A    
20101225082745.000|20101225082747.000|CC1|SERIES OF CHILDREN.             
20101225082747.000|20101225082750.000|CC1|THE WORD "FIRST BORN" IS A TITLE
20101225082750.000|20101225082752.000|CC1|OF HONOR QUITE INDEPENDENTLY OF 
20101225082752.000|20101225082753.000|CC1|WHETHER OTHER BROTHERS AND      
20101225082753.000|20101225082801.000|CC1|SISTERS FOLLOW OR NOT.          
20101225082801.000|20101225082803.000|CC1|SO ISRAEL IS DECIMATED BY GOD IN
20101225082803.000|20101225082808.000|CC1|THE BOOK OF EXODUS AS MY FIRST  
20101225082808.000|20101225082809.000|CC1|BORN SON.                       
20101225082809.000|20101225082812.000|CC1|AND THIS EXPRESSES ISRAEL'S     
20101225082812.000|20101225082814.000|CC1|ELECTION, ITS SINGULAR DIGNITY, 
20101225082814.000|20101225082817.000|CC1|THE PARTICULAR LOVE OF GOD THE  
20101225082817.000|20101225082820.000|CC1|FATHER.                         
20101225082820.000|20101225082823.000|CC1|THE EARLY CHURCH KNEW THAT IN   
20101225082823.000|20101225082826.000|CC1|JESUS THIS SAYING HAD ACQUIRED A
20101225082826.000|20101225082828.000|CC1|NEW DEPTH, THAT THE PROMISES    
20101225082828.000|20101225082832.000|CC1|MADE TO ISRAEL WERE SUMMED UP IN
20101225082832.000|20101225082833.000|CC1|HIM.                            
20101225082833.000|20101225082834.000|CC1|THUS THE LETTER TO THE HEBREWS  
20101225082834.000|20101225082837.000|CC1|CALLS JESUS THE FIRST BORN.     
20101225082837.000|20101225082841.000|CC1|SIMPLY IN ORDER TO DESIGNATE HIM
20101225082841.000|20101225082842.000|CC1|AFTER THE GROUND HAD BEEN       
20101225082842.000|20101225082845.000|CC1|PREPARED BY THE OLD TESTAMENT
